# color

<!-- Generated by swift-argument-parser -->

```
color --fav=<fav> [--second=<second>] [--help]
```

### Options

**--fav=\<fav\>**:
Your favorite color.

**--second=\<second\>**:
Your second favorite color.
This is optional.


**--help**:
Show help information.

## color.help

Show subcommand help information.

```
color help [<subcommands>...]
```

### Arguments

**subcommands**:
*Show help information.*
